an10.56:1.1: “Dasayima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an10.56:1.3: Asubhasanna, maranasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna, aniccasanna, anicce dukkhasanna, dukkhe anattasanna, pahanasanna, viragasanna, nirodhasanna—
an10.56:1.4: ima kho, bhikkhave, dasa sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana”ti.
